description.value:
Activate 1 Strike

Each of these unassuming sacks contains enough rotting fruit to provide a fungus leshy with 1 week's worth of rations, along with clusters of stones to help press out the fruit's juices. When you Strike a creature with a sack of rotten fruit, the sack is consumed while the creature takes @Damage[1d4[bludgeoning]] damage and must attempt an @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}. The range increment of a thrown sack of rotten fruit is 20 feet.

publication.title: Pathfinder Adventure: A Fistful of Flowers
